alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Perry; Union (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 4:56AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts will impact portions of Perry, western Union, Jackson, Bollinger, Perry, eastern Wayne and Cape Girardeau Counties through 600 AM CST... At 453 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a broken line of showers and isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bloomsdale to near Womac to 6 miles north of Shook. Movement was northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Leading edge of strong wind gusts will be near... Marble Hill around 510 AM CST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Bollinger Mill State Historic Site, Patton, Burfordville, Millersville, Daisy, Grand Tower, Altenburg, Carbondale, Murphysboro, De Soto, Elkville and Hurst. This includes Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 94 and 139. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
